main event: A sighting of the ECHO II satellite occurred over Minot, North Dakota on 8 August 1965 at 0613Z.
interesting points: The ECHO II satellite was sighted heading southeast at approximately 55 percent of the speed of light.,Observers reported bright lights in the sky while at the John Moses Hospital parking lot.,The sky had cloud cover ranging from 10/10 to 1/10.,The sighting lasted for about twenty minutes.,The report involved airmen as witnesses, specifically Airman First Class Dennis.
witness description: Airman First Class Dennis from Minot AFB
